#summary Tweets close to an entity

==entity types==
  * neighborhoods
  * business (1km radius)

==url==
{{{http://api.townme.com/v1/e/<guid>/view/twitter}}}


==format==
 Results are in the format of [http://apiwiki.twitter.com/Twitter-Search-API-Method:-search Twitter's JSON Search API].

==Example==

*query*
{{{
http://api.geoapi.com/v1/e/ritual-coffee-roasters-san-francisco-ca-94110/view/twitter?apikey=demo&pretty=1
}}}
